links.title: WeWork documents reveal it owes $18 billion in rent and is burning through cash as it seeks more funding
links.description: The office-leasing startup WeWork plans to raise more funding through a $500 million bond sale, according to the Financial Times. It's the first time the company is raising money from debt investors after it raised billions in venture capital from backers such as SoftBank.
